CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.transformation_metarule AS SELECT tm.id, s.name AS service, tm.sequence_number, rm.name AS agency_map, bm.name AS product_map, bnr.name AS product_network_agency, tm.stop_on_match FROM ruleform.transformation_metarule tm JOIN ruleform.product s ON tm.service = s.id JOIN ruleform.relationship rm ON tm.agency_map = rm.id JOIN ruleform.relationship bm ON tm.product_map = bm.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.agency bnr ON tm.product_network_agency = bnr.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.transformation_metarule OWNER TO core;
